short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser Extension build by an Elrond Warrior (Developer) in order to keep the people safe against phishing attacks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool was build to protect people that use Elrond apps from Phishing attacks. Two possible forms of phishing attacks techniques that can occure : link manipulation (ex myetherwallet - 2017), website forgery (ex. Paypal - 2006). 

When you're visiting an Elrond website, the tool will run multiple validations and will response in the pop up tab if the website is secure to be used.
